¿Cómo ser cliente preferente?: How to become a preferred customer?
Con Banorte tienes varias opciones para: With Banorte, you have several options to become a preferred customer and enjoy exclusive benefits:
- Mantener un saldo promedio superior a: - Maintain an average balance of over $500,000 pesos in checking and investments(1).
- Facturación mensual en tu tarjeta de c: - Monthly billing on your credit card exceeding $25,000 pesos.
- Ingresos comprobables superiores a $ 1: - Verifiable income exceeding $100,000 pesos per month.
- Contar con una tarjeta de crédito Plat: - Have a Platinum, Infinite United, or United Universe credit card.
- Contar con un crédito hipotecario vige: - Have an active mortgage loan greater than $4,000,000.
- Contar con un crédito de Auto vigente: - Have an active Auto loan greater than $500,000.
(1) En el saldo promedio mínimo se consi: (1) The minimum average balance includes savings accounts, checking accounts, term investments, investment trusts, and money market accounts.
